uniandes.unacloud.web.pmallocators

Class ExecutionAllocator

  • java.lang.Object
    • uniandes.unacloud.web.pmallocators.ExecutionAllocator
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BestFitAllocator, FirstFitAllocator, FirstFitDecreasingAllocator, RandomAllocator, RoundRobinAllocator, SingletonAllocator, SortingAllocator

    public abstract class ExecutionAllocator
extends Object
    Abstract class with main methods to allocate deployments. Validates enough resources in physical machine and enough IPs in lab The purpose of this class is to be extended to code allocator algorithms
    Author:
    Clouder and CesarF
